description: Schema for updating a cart item, including adding, removing, or adjusting the quantity of a product or variant.

product_id.description: The ID of the product to update in the cart.

variant_id.description: The ID of the product variant, or null if the product has no variants.

quantity.description: The quantity of the product to add to or update in the cart. Use `0` to remove the item from the cart.

externalDocs.description: API reference for the UpdateCartItem schema

title: UpdateCartItem
